item.description:
Anna Liffey's holds an epic pub-trivia event every Tuesday night that is open to all who feel they have enough random and obscure knowledge to take on a bar full of strangers.

Rules are simple: Teams of up to 5 people compete through several rounds of questions, and the winning team walks out with a cash prize.

I've only done this once before, but it was a lot of fun sitting there drinkning a beer and laughing at some of the random information my friends knew about the oddest subjects. Trivia starts at 9pm and goes till approximately 11pm.....but the place gets packed. That being said, I plan to get there around 7pm, grab some yum yums and hold a table for any fellow NHCer's who feel like playing. You need to be there by 8:30 at the latest to register to play, but if you can come earlier by all means stop by and hang out before hand.

The cost per person is $2.00. If more than 5 people attend, we can break up into smaller groups so we can all play.

Contact for the night is: Jeanie (860) 942-4708
(F.Y.I. reception in Liffey's is kinda sketchy and once trivia starts at 9pm, cell phones are not allowed)
item.name: Pub Trivia
